title: dEvI jagadIshvari dIna janAvana
sahitya:
dEvI jagadIshvari dIna janAvana shankari


anupallavi

 dEvarAja pUjitE dEsha kAla pravarttitE bhAva rAga tALa yutE bhairavi bhArgavi vinutE


caraNam   mahAdEva mOhitE mAmava lalitE varadE mahA tripura vAsitE mahanIya sampadE 
mahApApa vimOcitE mAnita guruguha mahitE mangaLa varapradE vashinyAdi vAgdEvatE
